info.title: Digital Recipe Box API
info.description: REST API for Digital Recipe Box - A comprehensive recipe management system with Google OAuth authentication

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: Google OAuth authentication endpoints - Login, logout, and authentication status

tags.name: Users
tags.description: User management endpoints - Get user profile and user recipes

tags.name: Recipes
tags.description: Recipe management endpoints - Create, read, and manage cooking recipes with ingredients, instructions, cooking time, and serving information

tags.name: Cookbooks
tags.description: Cookbook management endpoints - Organize recipes into collections for better management and organization

tags.name: Reviews
tags.description: Recipe review endpoints - Rate and review recipes to help other users discover great recipes

googleAuth.description: Google OAuth 2.0 authentication. Use /auth/google to initiate login flow.

bearerAuth.name: Authorization
bearerAuth.description: JWT token for authentication. Format: Bearer {token} (For testing purposes only)

get.description: Returns a welcome message for the Digital Recipe Box API

example.example: Welcome to Digital Recipe Box API

get.description: Redirects user to Google OAuth consent screen to begin authentication process
Handles the callback from Google OAuth and completes the authentication process
Endpoint hit after successful Google OAuth authentication
Endpoint hit after failed Google OAuth authentication
Logs out the currently authenticated user and destroys the session
Check if the current user is authenticated and return their basic information
Get a list of all users in the system with basic profile information. Returns public profile data only for privacy.
Get the profile information of the currently authenticated user
Get all public recipes created by a specific user

put.description: Update the profile information of a specific user. Users can update their own profile information including display name, first name, last name, email, and profile image URL.

delete.description: Permanently delete a user account. This action cannot be undone and will remove all user data from the system.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all public recipes available to all users. This endpoint returns recipes that have been marked as public by their creators.

post.description: Create a new recipe with ingredients, instructions, and metadata. Requires authentication. The recipe will be associated with the authenticated user.

get.description: Get all recipes (both public and private) owned by the authenticated user. Requires authentication.
Get a specific recipe by its ID

put.description: Update an existing recipe. Only the recipe creator can update their own recipes. Requires authentication.

delete.description: Delete a recipe and all its associated reviews

get.description: Get all cookbooks owned by the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new cookbook with a name, description, and optional recipe collection. Requires authentication. The cookbook will be associated with the authenticated user.

get.description: Get a specific cookbook by its ID

put.description: Update an existing cookbook with new name, description, or recipe collection. Only the cookbook owner can update their own cookbooks. Requires authentication.

get.description: Get all reviews for a specific recipe

post.summary: Add a review to a recipe
post.description: Add a new review to a recipe with rating and comment. Requires authentication. Users can only review public recipes and cannot review the same recipe twice.

get.description: Get all reviews created by the authenticated user
Get a specific review by its ID

put.description: Update an existing review. Only the review author can update their own reviews. Requires authentication.
